name: Boots-Cuts
description:
Record your own sound effects as the beats in the game.

(Hold on to the mic icon to record your voice, or use the default beat sound)

Press Z, X, N, M to fire beats.

The game currently supports only one soundtrack (Spring).

THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE, MOST OF THE GRAPHICS AND SOUNDTRACKS ARE PLACEHOLDERS.

KNOWN BUGS:

The "OK" button is misplaced when using the default sound as the beat. (Click on the same location to get through this bug)
